title: Panzerotti (fried Italian calzone)
ingredients: ['25g fresh yeast or 7g dried active yeast', '300 to 400ml warm sparkling water', '2 teaspoon caster sugar', '800g strong white bread flour', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 heaped tablespoon salt', 'For the filling', '1kg cherry tomatoes', '500g mozzarella cheese, cubed', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, or to taste', 'salt, to taste', 'fresh or dried oregano, to taste', '200g grated Parmesan cheese, as needed', 'sunflower oil for deep frying']
